summary: A hard-worker freelancer who falls in love with a doctor. While his life is getting worse every second. He must find the way to release his life to the beyond of everything.
cast: Sunny Suwanmethanont|Davika Hoorne|Violette Wautier|Torpong Chantabubpha|Surattanawee Suviporn|Kornpassorn Ratanameathanont|Nottapon Boonprakob|Vichai Matakul|Apinya Ingard|Panjavit Tangtongjit|Salinee Khemcharas|Atthasorn Sriraksayothin|Adisorn Tresirikasem|Banjong Pisanthanakun|Yok Sriyupa|Pranee Tawatcharaporn|Yongsak Saringkanon|Nutda Chawawanid|Vutichai Tanglaksilathong|Pornprapa Sriwalosakul|Sompech Robroo|Nanicha Khamwaen|Chalason Hanchana|Winai Terawattana|Thomtong Mekjaidee|Tanisorn Khamsonjik|Sansanee Oonjan|Renuka Boranmool|Theerapat Wongpaisarnkit|Thanawut Komchokpaisan|Apirom Siri|Jaruwat Poochart|Chatcharin Saetan|Norio Suzuki|Parama Malakul Na Ayudhya|Soraya Chiewchanchai|Thirawut Yuthong|Chonlasit Upanigkit|Tatath Tanawongkorn|Noppatjak Attanon|Chanokporn Sayoungkul|Premprida Sakulsripong|Nutsuko Chan|Theeraneth Yuki Tanaka|Thanapob Leeratanakajorn|Yodchai Nokun|Rinnapat Chaididthanakul|Somkit Jampawan|Aneakvith Vachirapipup|Satapath Rongkapun|Lucky Nasir|Namon Thitipattarakorn|Parung Chumponanomakun|Jularat Hanrungroj|Suparada Tawatcharaporn|Lalita Puwatanasarn|Nitchakarn Srisuk-Hallin|Warocha Soontornsiri|Morakot Liu|Supatra Pathsuwan
title: Freelance: Ham puay... Ham phak... Ham rak mor
